favoriteExamples.definition: to make a device operate, or to cause a device to play something, such as a CD or DVD, by pressing a switch:
favoriteExamples.original: Don't forget to put the brake on.

favoriteExamples.definition: to cover part of the body with clothes, shoes, make-up, or something similar:

favoriteExamples.definition: to phone someone again, or to phone someone who called you earlier:
